item.title: Login limit exceeded? ANOTHER PROBLEM! ~~~READ!~~~
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

When ever I try logging in to my server on the Heaven Pkz client, I get this
Login limit exceeded.
Too many connections from your address.

EDIT: Ok I realized, that you can only log in from 127.0.0.1 no matter what. You can’t use my server address, 0.0.0.0, localhost or any others, only 127.0.0.1, what do I do about this? In my EGUI.java i have this

import java.awt.BorderLayout;
import java.awt.Cursor;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import javax.swing.*;


public class EGUI {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        client.main(
                new String[] {
            "flamedfury.no-ip.biz", "127.0.0.1", 
            "flamedfury.no-ip.biz"
        });
    }
}

Sorry if you think it’s advertising but I’m just putting what the codes state. So, should I change the 127.0.0.1 to my server address or what? I’m so confused

I also found in the source folder in client.java

[code] public int GetWorld(int PlayerID) {
String Server = PlayerHandler.players[PlayerID].playerServer;

	if (Server.equals("flamedfury.no-ip.biz") || Server.equals("127.0.0.1")) {
		return 1;
	} else if (Server.equals("flamedfury.no-ip.biz")) {
		return 2;
	} else {
		println_debug("Invalid Server: " + Server);
		return 1; // 0; friendlist fix-bakatool
	}
}[/code]

Could this be the problem?

Read full topic
